data.actual_result: The usercard shows up, omitting the roles section
data.expected_result: The usercard should show the roles section, along with all of the user's roles.
data.short_description: Roles don't show up on join message usercard
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a server that gets join messages - Have someone join the server - add roles to the user - look at the user's usercard from the join message
